description: Try our easy to follow 28 By Sam Wood BLD Pizza recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: 28 By Sam Wood BLD Pizza Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Top pizza with fresh rocket, season with salt and pepper and cut into slices to serve.
